page.title: 12FARMING IN ROSSINGTON
page.content: Rossington is primarily an agricultural area. There are four farms in and around Rossington - Torne Valley, Hunster Grange, Rossington Grange, and Pithill. The Rossington farms are chiefly arable, though the Hunster Grange Farm has a herd of Highland cattle. A farm survey was carried out at Pithill Farm, Rossington. Pithill is an arable farm and covers 600 acres of land. The only animals they have are three horses, five cats and three dogs. Pithill Farm, Rossington has been owned by the farmer for 25 years and three men work on it. To work the farm they have - tractors, baler, seed drill , combine harvester, plough and fork lift . They practise crop rotation growing -oil seed rape , wheat,peas,barley and potatoes.
